thread.title: UNC's Kennedy Meeks sings at Late Night with Roy
thread.title_full: UNC's Kennedy Meeks sings at Late Night with Roy

title: UNC's Kennedy Meeks sings at Late Night with Roy
text:
FOXSPORTS UNC's Kennedy Meeks sings at Late Night with Roy 
Kennedy Meeks may have stolen the show for the second year in a row at Late Night with Roy. Bob Donnan / USA TODAY Sports Oct 23, 2015 at 11:31p ET 0Shares 
There was only way Kennedy Meeks could top his performance last year at Late Night with Roy. 
On Friday, the North Carolina junior forward accompanied an a cappella group to sing Drake's hit single, "Hotline Bling." true 
Last year, Meeks rolled around the Dean Dome floor, lip-synching Whitney Houston's "I Will Always Love You." 
The 6-foot-9 Meeks averaged 11.4 points and 7.3 boards last season for the Tar Heels . 0
